detaileddescription.para: connect the result of a "psql -c "select wwn,name from device_port_info"" to something that looks readable like an InputStream may want to consider later (http://h10032.www1.hp.com/ctg/Manual/c02912115.pdf):

sect1.title: 10.x, 11.x, 12.0 (with edit to data/databases/pg_hba.conf to allow host), 12.1 (pg_hba.conf edit, 12.1.0 and 12.1.4)
